General.Name: Indopoly Swakarsa Industry Tbk
General.Description: PT Indopoly Swakarsa Industry Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a flexible-packaging manufacturing company in Indonesia, China, Singapore, and the United States. The company offers plain, heatsealable, matte, metallized, and thermal films, as well as other specialty products. It also manufactures polypropylene films. In addition, the company involved in the investment business. It provides its products to food and beverage; household and personal care; cigarette; label; graphic; industrial; and other industries. PT Indopoly Swakarsa Industry Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

8.Name: Mr. Leo  Firdaus
8.Title: Commercial & International Operation Director and Director
